content: higher love yayalovestoknit corrected march 28 2020 my first design for 2020 this hat pattern is being offered to all who knit for family friends and those in need in other words to those who knit with love thanks to the sharp eye of koviljka on ravelry a correction has been made in instruction 7 of the band portion the correction is indicated in red song of the day if you re old enough to remember the 1986 hit by steve winwood enjoy and reminisce https //youtu be/k9olaiio3l8 after all these years this song continues to touch my heart here s a version by steve s daughter lilly backed up by her dad https //youtu be/css4xlhknpw steve winwood is now 71 i remember him as an 18-year-old yikes size adult the blue sample hat measures 8-⅟4 from top to bottom and 19 around the bottom band unstretched the red sample hat measures 8 from top bottom and 19 around the bottom band unstretched yarn if you are knitting this design as a chemo hat be sure to select a soft yarn that does not contain any animal fiber wool and other animal fiber may be scratchy the sample hats were knit using premier yarns everyday soft worsted 100% acrylic this is a soft yarn that does not pill 1 | pa ge 64 grams/115 yards in twilight blue 61 grams/110 yards in red heather scarf or ribbon smooth and long enough to fit around the hat with ease and to tie in a bow or drape needles us 06 and us 07 circular needles plus us 07 double pointed needles other tools stitch marker tapestry/darning needle gauge 19 sts x 26 rnds = 4 square measured on the stockinette body abbreviations used k= knit k2togtbl = knit two stitches together through the backloop p = purl skp slip knit pass slipped stitch over = slip one stitch knitwise knit the next stitch then pass the slipped stitch over the knit stitch and off of the needle note this decrease method results in a stitch that leans to the left unlike the more commonly used k2tog which leans to the right st s = stitch es 2yo = 2 yarn overs sequentially begin pattern using the 06 circular needle cast on 88 sts taking care to not twist the stitches place the stitch marker to indicate the beginning of round and join to begin knitting in the round band 1 knit 4 rounds of stockinette to form the rolled edge 2 purl 3 rounds 3 knit 2 rounds 4 purl 3 rounds 5 knit 4 rounds 6 k4 skp 2yo k2tog k5 skp 2yo k2tog k9 repeat instruction between the brackets until 5 sts remain then k5 7 k4 k1 knit the 1st yo purl the 2nd yo k7 knit 1st yo purl 2nd yo k10 repeat the instruction between the brackets until 5 sts remain then k5 8 knit 4 rounds 9 purl 3 rounds 2 | pa ge 10
